name: VitalWatch
subtitle: Keeping You Alive
description: The Vital Watch is a conceptual health-monitoring smartwatch, and we have developed a website to showcase its features, including real-time tracking of heart rate, body temperature, oxygen levels, food intake, blood pressure, and emergency response.
role: Worked with the team in conceptualizing and building the website.

name: Kronos
subtitle: Time In Time Out
description: A Java application developed using Remote Method Invocation (RMI) to monitor employee clock-in and clock-out times.
role: Worked primarily on the client-side GUI and the database for the application's leaderboards.

name: Wordy
subtitle: Word Multiplayer Game
description: A Java-based word game developed using CORBA for the backend, with two different client applications created in Java and Python.
role: Worked primarily on the client-side GUI and the database for the application's leaderboards.

name: Animalphabet
subtitle: Animal Search Engine
description: A web application using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to search for animals. Integrated the Animal API by Ninja API and YouTube Data API v3. Implemented dynamic content generation, multimedia display, and interactive search functionality to enhance user experience.
role: Worked on the backend for sorting animal data and front-end design of the website.

name: Document Review System
subtitle: SLU Document Reviewer
description: A web application designed to facilitate employee document reviews at Saint Louis University. It includes requesters who submit documents, reviewers from various offices, and an admin who manages user accounts.
role: Worked on the UI/UX design and front-end development, ensuring the website's responsiveness.

name: KapeLink
subtitle: Online Ordering System with Chatbot
description: A Progressive Web Application for online ordering at Benguet Coffee Project Cafe, with features for order tracking and a chatbot for FAQs.
role: Working as a Backend Developer and in Quality Assurance.
